capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving outcomes such as conservation of the natural environment and Aboriginal heritage, indicating a need for efficient use of resources and commitment to quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Given the casual nature of the role and the variety of tasks including administrative support, event support, and incident management, the ability to plan and prioritise work is essential.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Effective communication is crucial for this role, as it involves working closely with the community, Traditional Owners, and providing customer service.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: The role requires respecting and valuing cultural knowledge and connections, indicating a high relevance of valuing diversity.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with team members, Traditional Owners, and the community is a key aspect of the role, highlighting the importance of working collaboratively.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Integrity is crucial in respecting the cultural significance of Worimi Country and managing the Worimi Conservation Lands responsibly.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: The ability to work alone or with minimal supervision, as mentioned in the job description, requires effective self-management.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Experience with computer-based systems for administration tasks is required, indicating the need for foundational technology skills.

skills.name: Cultural Competency
skills.description: Understanding and respecting Aboriginal cultural heritage and working effectively with Aboriginal communities.

skills.name: Administrative Proficiency
skills.description: Handling administrative tasks, financial transactions, and using computer-based systems efficiently.

skills.name: Emergency Response Support
skills.description: Supporting incident management activities such as fires and search and rescues.

generalRole.title: Cultural Heritage Administrative Assistant
generalRole.description: This role combines administrative support with a focus on environmental and cultural heritage conservation, requiring a unique blend of administrative skills, cultural competency, and environmental awareness.
